definition: to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: In the beginning the quarries lay far beyond the city limits.
sentences.chinese: 起初采石场还远离城市的边界。

sentences.english: It was fine at first; most of my friends had moved home too.
sentences.chinese: 起初我觉得还好，我的很多朋友也都回家投靠父母了。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, I did not like her. I thought she was too much enchanting.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，起初我并不喜欢她，感觉她太妖娆了。

sentences.english: So a lot of Zhejiang and produced poor qunosity products enter the market.
sentences.chinese: 于是多量浙江一带产的劣质产品起初进入市场。

sentences.english: Duanwu Festival is originated in China, and was initially a day to prevent illness.
sentences.chinese: 端午节起源于中国，起初是人们以祛病防疫的节日。

sentences.english: At first, many of the townsmen were opposed to the abolition of slavery.
sentences.chinese: 起初，许多住在城里的人反对废除奴隶制度。

sentences.english: This is what we have, rather dully, taken care to affirm at first.
sentences.chinese: 这个是我们曾经费心来处理，起初是用来作为肯定。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the search engine is only an accessorial tool in some famous portal sites.
sentences.chinese: 起初，搜索引擎只是一些著名门户网站的辅助工具。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese philosophers were born out of sorcery.
sentences.chinese: 中国古代哲学家们起初多信奉巫术。

sentences.english: This initially comprised 10 main distributors and 28 dealerships.
sentences.chinese: 这件起初由10个主要经销商和28经销商销售。

sentences.english: At first she shivered from her fear but at last she could vanquish it.
sentences.chinese: 起初她因害怕而颤抖，但最后终于能克服它。

sentences.english: American officials initially refused her a work visa.
sentences.chinese: 美国官员起初拒绝发给她工作签证。

sentences.english: At first, Chan seems to be a pathetic patsy to Tuckers aggression.
sentences.chinese: 起初，成龙像是个老受塔克欺负的倒霉蛋。

sentences.english: At first he removes it and mingles with the children.
sentences.chinese: 起初，他删除，并与孩子交织在一起。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the models were restricted to open-type linkages.
sentences.chinese: 起初，这个模型是局限于开式连接。

definition: original/former/originally/formerly/at first/so, actually, as it turns out
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
